https://tmrev.io/movie/481620-Cinecittà Babylon 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pEWe5NxXPUmw7539I0rd75nhcRx.jpg The story of Italian cinema under Fascism, a sophisticated film industry built around the founding of the Cinecittà studios and the successful birth of a domestic star system, populated by very peculiar artists among whom stood out several beautiful, magnetic, special actresses; a dark story of war, drugs, sex, censorship and tragedy. Cinecittà Babylon
